card.name: Bone Prophet
card.text: When this creature enters, it deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

card.name: Emergent Anomaly
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, tap up to one target creature. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: Priest of Perfection
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, draw a card. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: Far-Off Factory
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Contagious Murder
card.text: Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. When Contagious Murder leaves your graveyard, copy it. You may cast the copy. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Endless Distortion Line
card.text: This artifact enters tapped. You may return an untapped land you control to its owner’s hand rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. {T}: Add {C}. Crew—Tap four other artifacts you control.

card.name: Matryoshka Crawler
card.text: When Matryoshka Crawler dies, you may search your library for a colorless card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Sorting Servant
card.text: When Sorting Servant dies, search your library for a colorless card with mana value 5 or greater, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Rattlefiend
card.text: Vigilance When Rattlefiend dies, if it had base toughness 2 or greater, create a token copy of Rattlefiend, except it’s X/X, where X is Rattlefiend’s base toughness minus 1.

card.name: Doorwarden
card.text: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Eyes Scorched from Divinity
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, destroy target permanent. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Mechanised Hunter
card.text: When this creature enters, you may put an artifact card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield, where X is this creature’s power. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: Deepmind Oracle
card.text: Flying When Deepmind Oracle enters, surveil X, where X is its power. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: New-Life Acolyte
card.text: Artifact spells with mana value 2 or greater you cast cost {1} less to cast. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: Thought-Theft
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 1 life. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: The Red Door
card.text: When this artifact enters, you may activate one of its abilities without paying its costs. 2UB, Sacrifice this artifact: Choose one— • Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. • Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Door to Clear Skies
card.text: Mill three cards. Draw a card. You may return an untapped Island you control to its owner’s hand rather than pay this spell’s mana cost.

card.name: Dreamlured Giant
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you have gained this turn. This effect can’t reduce the cost of this spell to less than {2}. {1}, Discard this card: Choose one— • You gain 2 life. • Draw a card. You lose 2 life.

card.name: The Gardener's Saga
card.text: His roots twist and twist and reach deeper and deeper. I, II — This land gains “{T}: Add {C}.” until your next turn. III — Search your library for a non-Saga land card and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Binding Decision
card.text: When Binding Decision enters, target opponent chooses a nontoken creature they control and exiles it until Binding Decision leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Inexorable Pressure
card.text: Flash Flying When this creature enters, it gains “Creatures and enchantments you don’t control lose all abilities” until your next first main phase.

card.name: Vertigomancer
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, mill a card. Deep dwelling— As long as your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size, this creature gets +3/+3.

card.name: Unsightly Mutate
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Deep dwelling— As long as your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size, this creature gets +2/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Beacon Dreamer
card.text: Landfall— Whenever a land you control enters, you may activate one of this creature’s abilities without paying its costs. 2WW: Create a 1/1 white Nightmare creature token with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.”

card.name: Restlessness
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Nightmare creature tokens with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.”

card.name: Secrets of Radiance
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: You draw a card and you gain 2 life. Activate only as a sorcery. 1WB: Create a 1/1 white Nightmare creature token with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.”

card.name: Yklev, In a Strange Land
card.text: Landfall— Whenever a land enters under your control, you gain 1 life. [+1]: Untap target land. Surveil 1. [-3]: Search your library or graveyard for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Suffocating Gaze
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a legendary permanent. Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Vaga, True Prophet
card.text: (Creatures don’t lose loyalty from damage.) {+1}: Add one mana of any color. {-1}: Put a loyalty counter on each other permanent you control with a loyalty counter on it.

card.name: Arbiter
card.text: (Creatures don’t lose loyalty from damage.) {+1}: Phase out up to one other target permanent until your next turn. {-3}: This creature deals 7 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Chimerism
card.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile them. Their controller creates a tapped X/X colorless Horror creature token, where X is the combined power of those creatures.

card.name: Foreboding Monolith
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Rite of Resurrection
card.text: Destroy all creatures. Then you may return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Overcome All
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner’s hand. Create a token copy of the returned creature, except it isn’t legendary and has haste.

card.name: Lammasu, Dream-Stilled
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: Ichor-Drowned
card.text: {T}: Mill a card. When you do, add {C}. Deep dwelling— {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size.

card.name: Unfair Judgment
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature. Exile target creature if it’s attacking or if you paid this spell’s additional cost.

card.name: Horrific Punishment
card.text: Destroy target creature unless its controller pays 3 life, discards a card or sacrifices a nonland permanent and then repeats this process twice.

card.name: Lamplure
card.text: Target creature you control gains trample and must be blocked if able until end of turn. You may have target creature you don’t control fight it. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Somnonaut Drone
card.text: Haste When this creature enters, if it’s not a token, create a token copy of it. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step unless there are four or more lands in your realm. (Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)

card.name: Observation Agent
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Deathtouch When this creature dies, draw a card if there are five or more lands in your realm. (Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)

card.name: Mirror Eater
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, you may create a tapped and attacking token copy of another attacking creature. At the beginning of the next end step, exile that token.

card.name: Volcanic Steambed
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) This land enters tapped. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Far-off Door
card.text: When Far-off Door enters, search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Far-off Door has all loyalty abilities of nonartifact permanents you control.

card.name: A Blossoming of Flowers
card.text: This creature’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands in your realm. (Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped with a stun counter on it, then shuffle.

card.name: Symbiotic Host

card.name: Identity Shatter

card.name: Mycelial Coating

card.name: Ashiok, Dream Feaster
card.text: You may cast nonland cards exiled with Ashiok planeswalkers and spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells. [-2]: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player exiles that card.

card.name: Echo of Distorted Outcomes
card.text: [+1]: Sacrifice up to one nontoken creature you control. Create a token copy of it except it’s an artifact in addition to its other types. [-2]: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. [-5]: Create two token copies of Echo of Distorted Outcomes, except they’re not legendary.

card.name: Edge of a Precipice
card.text: Choose one— • Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. • Return target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Edge of a Precipice.

card.name: Hall of the Hands
card.text: This land enters tapped with three wish counters on it. {T}: Add {C}. {7}, Remove a wish counter from this land: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Eightfold Sight
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When this enchantment enters, you may phase out enchanted creature. (It and anything attached to it is treated as if it doesn’t exist until your next untap.) Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Then sacrifice this enchantment unless it entered this turn.

card.name: Ashiok, Lone Dreamer
card.text: If you would draw a card, instead exile the top three cards of your library, then put a card you own exiled with an Ashiok planeswalker into your hand. [-2]: Exile the top card of your library, then put a card you own exiled with an Ashiok planeswalker into your hand.

If it’s a nonland card, you may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Antisun's Domain
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. When Antisun’s Domain enters, if you control five or more lands with different names, create two 1/1 white Nightmare creature tokens with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.”

card.name: Celestial Messenger
card.text: Lifelink This creature can’t block. W/BW/BW/B, Pay 3 life: If this creature is a Nightmare, it becomes a Bird Angel with flying and base power and toughness 3/3. W/BW/BW/BW/BW/B, Pay 5 life: If this creature is an Angel, it becomes an Archon with double strike.

card.name: Forgotten Prophet
card.text: Vigilance When this creature attacks, you may put a loyalty counter on each permanent you control with a loyalty counter on it.

card.name: 001, Errant Spark-Engine
card.text: Menace, haste You may cast 001, Errant Spark-Engine from your graveyard by removing three loyalty counters from among permanents you control in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Star-Binding Command
card.text: Choose two— • Players can’t cast noncreature spells until end of turn. • You gain 3 life. • Prevent all damage target creature would deal until end of turn. • Return target creature you control to its owner’s hand and draw a card.

card.name: Desolate Meeting
card.text: When Desolate Meeting enters, create a 1/1 white Nightmare creature token with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.” Whenever you attack, if you control five or more lands, Nightmares you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: The Pact
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters, you may return a permanent card with lesser mana value than it from your graveyard to your hand. If you don’t, mill two cards.

card.name: Tyrant's Rage
card.text: Tyrant’s Rage deals X damage to each creature and each planeswalker, where X is the number of lands in your realm. (Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)

card.name: Saylthe, Twice-Drowned
card.text: {T}: Mill two cards, then exile up to one instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast a copy of that card. Activate only on your turn. Deep Dwelling — Once each turn, when you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap this creature if your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size.

card.name: Water-Witch's Bargain
card.text: Deep dwelling— Mill four cards. Return each land card milled this way from your graveyard to your hand. If your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size, return each nonland permanent card milled this way to your hand.

card.name: Tithetaker Angel

card.text: Horror creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control a non-Horror creature. Whenever one or more non-Horror creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card if you control a Horror.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent, draw a card. Then you may cast a spell from your hand with mana value lesser than or equal to the damage dealt without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Somnibiotic Emergence

card.name: Cascade Coherency Failure
card.text: Choose one or more— • Destroy target artifact. • This spell deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to you. • This spell deals 4 damage to target planeswalker and 2 damage to you.

card.name: Experience Infinite Time
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. You may cast a spell from your hand with mana value lesser than the amount of mana spent to cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Flashback 3WWUU (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Novice Dream-Binder
card.text: When this creature enters, tap up to one target creature and put a stun counter on it. You gain life equal to that creature’s power.

card.name: Bladecraft Scion
card.text: First strike When this creature enters, it deals 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker unless an opponent has this creature deal 2 damage to them.

card.name: Gravewalking
card.text: When this enchantment enters, you may mill four cards. {B}, Discard a creature card: Choose target creature card in your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. Creatures cast this way enter with a finality counter on them.

card.name: Moonlight Oracle
card.text: When this creature enters, surveil 3, then draw a card. Deep Dwelling— Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, you may return one of them to your hand if your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size.

card.name: Strange Wayfarer
card.text: Flash When this creature enters or dies, create a tapped colorless land token named Everywhere that is every basic land type.

card.name: Reshape Reality
card.text: You may cast a spell with mana value 7 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost. Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Figure of Some Importance
card.text: Deception UUU (UUU, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) When this creature enters, if it was cast or entered from your hand, each player may shuffle their hand and graveyard into their library and then draw seven cards.

card.name: One of Keys
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Deception 2W (2W, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Unceasing Observation
card.text: Choose one— • Put target creature on the top of its owner’s library. • Put target spell on the top of its owner’s library. • Put target spell on the bottom of its owner’s library.

card.name: Distortion World
card.text: When Distortion World enters, if it was cast, exile all other nonland permanents and create four colorless 1/1 Faerie Horror creatures with flying that can’t block. At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, they may put a card they own exiled with this enchantment onto the battlefield under their control.

card.name: Cloudscape Observer
card.text: When this creature enters, return up to one target creature you don’t control to its owner’s hand. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: Celestial Realm
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) This land enters tapped. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Goddess of Puppet Strings
card.text: [+1]: You may pay 1 life. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Faerie Horror creature token with flying and “This creature can’t block.” [-6]: Destroy up to one target creature. When you do, put a creature from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Exile it at end of turn.

card.name: The Gardener, Waning
card.text: Whenever a land you control enters, add one mana of any color. [-1]: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand. [-1]: You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Ever-Burning Soul
card.text: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. When you do, you may activate this ability an additional time this turn. [-2]: This planeswalker deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards exiled with it. If that permanent would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Aeon, of the Living Coffin
card.text: When Aeon, of the Living Coffin enters, mill four cards and return each land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. [+2]: Creatures you control gain reach and trample until your next turn. [-3]: Untap target land you control. It becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste. It’s still a land.

card.name: Phantom City
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) This land enters tapped. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Liferoot Gnawer
card.text: When this creature enters, choose one— • This creature deals 3 damage divided among any number of targets. • Gain control of target land. It gains “{T}: Add {C}.” and loses all other abilities.

card.name: Living Heart
card.text: Landfall— Whenever a land you control enters, draw a card. Your maximum hand size is two.

card.name: Cryptbreaking
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Animus Conflagration
card.text: This spell deals 5 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Ancient Forerunner
card.text: Ancient Forerunner has first strike during your turn. When this creature enters, it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent. Iterate (When this enters, conjure a colorless {6} 4/4 artifact creature version of it without iterate into your hand.)

card.name: The Ephemeral Piper
card.text: Enchantments you control have hexproof. [+2]: Target creature you control gains vigilance and can’t be blocked until end of turn. [-1]: Target creature phases out until The Ephemeral Piper leaves the battlefield. [-4]: Create a colorless enchantment token named Ringing Noise with “At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, for each creature they control, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 1.”

card.name: Wyrm's Death
card.text: Destroy target creature. You may have this spell deals 3 damage to each other creature if there are five or more lands in your realm. If you didn’t, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. (Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)

card.name: Interstellar Drifter
card.text: Deception BGU (BGU, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Menace Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a planeswalker. Return up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Crackling Serpent
card.text: Deception {4} ({4}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a nonland permanent. If they can’t, you draw a card.

card.name: Reflective Savannah
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) This land enters tapped. Ominous {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery: Draw a card. During your next turn, you may play this card from exile.)

card.name: Shortcut Through Hell
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if this land entered this turn. {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.

card.name: MX-04, Electric Usurper
card.text: MX-04 enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each land in your realm. You gain that much life. (Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.) [+1]: This planeswalker deals 3 damage to target opponent. [-3]: Create a colorless Mx-04 token planeswalker with 1 starting loyalty named Replicant with “+1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.” and “-2: Draw a card.”

card.name: Wandering Moon
card.text: (This creature is black.) Flying, trample Lands you control are Swamps.

card.name: Like Butterflies on Strings
card.text: Deception 2UU (2UU, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Flying When Like Butterflies on Strings deals combat damage to a player, if it entered this turn, gain control of up to one target creature for as long as you control this creature.

card.name: Veteran Bloodhunter
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink When Veteran Bloodhunter enters, conjure a card named Drain into your hand. (It’s a {B} sorcery with “Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”)

card.name: Infiltration Agent
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, conjure a card named Drain into your hand. (It’s a {B} sorcery with “Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”) This creature can’t be blocked if an opponent has lost life this this turn.

card.name: Piercing Betrayal
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards. 1B, Exile Piercing Betrayal from your graveyard as a sorcery: Conjure two cards named Drain into your hand. (They’re {B} sorceries with “Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”)

card.name: Sentinel of Dead Lands
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent. At the beginning of your end step, if you haven’t cast a noncreature spell this turn, conjure a card named Spark into your hand. (It’s a {R} sorcery with “Spark deals 1 damage to any target.”)

card.name: Towersmog Ghoul
card.text: First strike. Whenever this creature attacks alone, conjure a card named Spark into your hand. (It’s a {R} sorcery with “Spark deals 1 damage to any target.”)

card.name: Weight of Tradition
card.text: Menace 3RR, Discard this card: It deals 5 damage to any target.

card.name: Callous Observer
card.text: Trample Whenever this creature attacks, conjure a card named Drain into your hand. (It’s a {B} sorcery with “Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”) This creature gets +1/+1 for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

card.name: Siltcurrent Obsession
card.text: Mill three cards. When you do, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Overcoalesce 6GU (You may cast this from your graveyard for 6GU. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of ‘target’ with ‘each’. It enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

card.name: Insubstantial Glimpse
card.text: Deception 2WW (2WW, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Flying, lifelink When Insubstantial Glimpse deals combat damage to a player, if it entered this turn, exile up to one target creature.

card.name: Maktel and the Unknowable
card.text: (Creatures don’t lose loyalty from damage.) {+1}: Mill two cards. Maktel and the Unknowable gains trample until end of turn. {-1}: Mill three cards. You may return a creature or land card milled this way to your hand. {-3}: Mill four cards. You may put a creature or land card milled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Protostar Bombardment
card.text: When Protostar Bombardment enters, it deals 4 damage to each creature. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, its controller loses 2 life unless they sacrifice a land.

card.name: Eye of the Abominable
card.text: Once during each of your turns, whenever one or more creature cards with mana value 3 or less leave your graveyard, you may create a token copy of one of them. When Eye of the Abominable enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Meet the Beyond
card.text: You gain 2 life. Draw a card. Conjure three copies of Through Violence into your library, then shuffle. (It’s a {4} sorcery with “Exile target nonland permanent. Draw a card.”)

card.name: Illuminant Master
card.text: Lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Nightmare creature token with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.” Whenever this creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Nightmare you control.

card.name: Unexpected Passenger
card.text: When this creature enters, conjure a card named Spark into your hand. (It’s a {R} sorcery with “Spark deals 1 damage to any target.”) Whenever an opponent loses life on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Necromantic Overspill
card.text: Return target creature or planeswalker card with mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If that card has mana value lesser than 5, mill a number of cards equal to twice the difference.

card.name: Devoted Numena
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, exile another target nonland permanent until this creature leaves the battlefield. When a permanent enters this way, if it was a creature, put a decayed counter on it. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Replicant
card.text: Additional processing concerns routed through crude bodies. Materials of construction: Enigmatic, unique, Abiogenetic. PRIORITY: Expand. [+1]: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life [-2]: Draw a card.

card.name: Drain
card.text: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (This is a conjured card and not legal in deckbuilding)

card.name: Spark
card.text: Spark deals 1 damage to any target. (This is a conjured card and not legal in deckbuilding)

card.name: Through Violence
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Draw a card. (This is a conjured card and not legal in deckbuilding)

card.name: Spite-Crowned Champion
card.text: 1B: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. When this creature attacks, if it has power 4 or greater and no counters on it, you may put a menace counter on it and destroy up to one target creature with power 3 or less.

card.name: Grasping Eternity
card.text: When Grasping Eternity enters, create a 1/1 white Nightmare creature token with lifelink and “This creature can’t block.” At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, choose one— • Each opponent loses 1 life. • Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: The Gardener, Crowned
card.text: The Gardener, Crowned costs 1 less to cast for each colorless permanent you control. (Lands are colorless.) [+2]: Create three colorless 1/1 Faerie Horror creature tokens with flying that can’t block. [-3]: Gain control of target permanent. [-5]: You get an emblem with “You may look at the top card of your library any time and you may play lands and cast colorless spells from the top of your library.”

card.name: The Howling Door
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library. Put a burden counter on The Howling Door: You lose 1 life for each burden counter on The Howling Door. Mill a card.

card.name: The Eternal Echo
card.text: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of The Eternal Echo, create a colorless Echo planeswalker token at the beginning of your next end step and put 3 loyalty counters on it. It gains that ability, except it costs -1. [+1]: You gain 2 life. [0]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. [-2]: Each opponent loses 2 life. [-5]: Draw a card.

card.name: Apocalypse of the Forest
card.text: Flying, lifelink, haste 4BBBB: Destroy all other creatures. Activate only once and only as a sorcery.
